filename.description: The filename of this calendar in /c/

id.description: Which bit in a merged calendar id that this calendar corresponds to, from least significant. An id of -1 means that this calendar is always hidden and cannot be merged

order.description: How to order this calendar, lower numbers are shown first

category.description: The heading of this calendar. Subheadings can be added seperated by /

hidden.description: If true, this calendar will not be shown in the picker, but can still be used in the URL
